tree.name: Day'Ron Sharpe
tree.tradeDescription: Nets traded Landry Shamet to Suns for draft rights to Day'Ron Sharpe (#29) and Jevon Carter

assetsGivenUp.name: Landry Shamet
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: Nets received Shamet and Reggie Perry rights from LAC, Bruce Brown from DET. BKN sent draft rights to Jay Scrubb (#55) to LAC.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2020 BKN 2nd Round Pick (#55)
assetsGivenUp.note: Draft rights to Jay Scrubb, sent to LAC in Shamet trade
